title: Cruet Set
medium_display:
Large caster set, silver and clear blown and cut glass, London, by the maker, ##, in cruciform punch,

(?), Rococo Revival style, the frame silver and fitted with 5 gadrooned ring holders and terminating in a loop handle ornamented with foliate scrolls; four openwork shell feet below a stylized serpentine curve with an acanthus leaf at the knee; a large rococo carto uche at the front (from which an armorial device has been removed): the stand fitted with two casters, one muffineer, an oil and a vinegar bottle of glass with hinged lids. The casters ornamented with scrolls and husks in high relief; the centre with an open cartouche, the circular feet openwork in rococo style and the tops spirally worked with a stylized flame finial. The muffineer of similar configuration but of larger size. The oil and vinegar bottles cut with a band of oculi at the waist of the body and a series of geometric cuttings at neck, shoulder and foot. The necks fitted with alternate foliate scrolled and ribbed motifs rising to a gadrooned neck ring from which depends a double foliate scroll handle with a stylized acanthus thumb piece, the lid hinged with a shell-form thumb hold and gadrooned at the edge.

Square gilt paper label with black number 57. Muffineer: maker's mark as above, partially abraded. Leopard's head, lion rampant, date letter letter P, partially abraded, on inner surface of foot. Oil and vinegar bottles: no hallmarks. Casters: one marked inside foo t, similar to muffineer, but illegible due to repairs; inner flange of cover marked with lion rampant and partially abraded maker's mark; other similarly marked but with date letter obliterating the left and lower ends of the cruciform punch; flange of cover marked with lion rampant and partially obliterated maker's mark.

Condition: Frame: numerous small repairs. Muffineer: foot repaired at inside join of body and foot. Oil and vinegar bottles: loop handles resoldered at join to neck ring. Casters: solder repair at join of foot and body.

Display_dims: Frame: 12 1/8" O.H. x 11 3/8" O.W. x 11 5/16" O.D. (30.7 x 28.8 x 28.6 cm) Muffineer: 8 5/8" h. x 3 1/8" w. (21.9 x 8 cm) Casters: (1) 7 5/16" H. 2 5/ 8" w. (18.4 x 6.7).

Oil and vinegar bottles: 7 5/8" h. x 2 3/8" Diam. at base (19.3 x 6 cm); 7 9/16" h. x 2 3/8" Diam. at base (19.2 x 6 cm)
